metadata.title: Baptism Gifts for Boys Girls Baby Christening Catholic LDS Christian Lutheran I Am A Child of God Embroidered Soft Large White Towel Confirmation Gift for Teenage Girl First Communion Decorations
features: The Perfect Gift to Remind Someone You Love That They are SO LOVED.
Beautiful Embroidery I Am A Child of God Makes For The Perfect Bathroom Guest Towel.
They Will Be Literally WRAPPED IN LOVE Every Time they Bathe or Shower.
Stays Nice With Every Washing. 100% Cotton SOFT White Towel.
They Will Be Literally WRAPPED IN LOVE :)
description: This pure white towel is soft and elegantly embroidered with the Phrase "I Am A Child of God". It makes the perfect gift for anyone you love of for YOURSELF!! When a child is baptized, a soft pure white towel is such an exciting gift for them. They get to use it to dry off instead of an old used towel. It helps them to feel so clean, happy and loved! It's a gift and a memory they will treasure forever. 8 year old Andrew received a towel on his baptism day from his Aunt. It was his favorite gift! His siblings were jealous and all wanted one too. And 2 years later he still has his white towel and remembers his baptism and how much God and his Aunt love him every time he uses. I mean every time he sees it hanging in the bathroom ;) That's multiple times a day that he sees it and remembers that HE IS LOVED. This really is something that EVERY ONE should have hanging in their bathroom or bedroom. Let's fill the world with love :) It's soft enough for a baby and large enough that adults love them too!
